Privacy.title: Terms and Privacy Policy
Privacy.intro: These rules describe how you may use JobPortal and how we protect your data. By using the website you agree to follow the terms below.

userResponsibilities.heading: 1. User responsibilities
userResponsibilities.description: When you create an account or publish content on JobPortal, you agree to use the Service fairly and respectfully.

items.1: Provide accurate and up-to-date information in your profile, vacancies and messages.
items.2: Do not mislead other users, publish fake jobs or send spam.
items.3: Do not upload illegal, offensive, discriminatory or explicit content.
items.4: Use the Service only for job search, hiring and related career purposes.

limitations.heading: 2. Limitation of responsibility
limitations.description: JobPortal is a platform that connects candidates and employers. We cannot fully control the behaviour or content of all users.

items.1: We are not responsible for the accuracy of vacancies, resumes or other information posted by users.
items.2: We are not liable for any losses, missed opportunities or disputes that may arise between users.
items.3: We do not guarantee that the Service will always work without interruptions or errors, although we try to keep it stable.

companyRights.heading: 3. Rights of the Company
companyRights.description: To keep the platform safe and useful, JobPortal reserves several important rights.

items.1: Moderate, hide or delete content that violates these rules or applicable law.
items.2: Temporarily or permanently block accounts that abuse the Service.
items.3: Update the functionality, design or rules of the Service at any time.
items.4: Use anonymised, aggregated data to improve JobPortal and its analytics.

privacy.heading: 4. Privacy and personal data
privacy.description: We treat your personal data carefully and process it only for clear, legitimate purposes.

items.1: We collect data that you provide directly (such as profile details, CV, vacancies and messages) and technical data needed to run the Service.
items.2: We use this data to operate JobPortal, show relevant jobs or candidates, prevent fraud and improve the product.
items.3: We may share data with trusted providers (for example hosting, analytics or communication tools) under data-protection agreements.
items.4: You may request access, correction or deletion of your personal data as allowed by the laws of your country.
